timestamp.description: The long value of System.currentMillis() when this action was invoked. It's a string cause long values are not supported.

items.description: An extension of serialized editor action that also includes a timestamp.

actionsLog.description: A list of serialized editor actions plus their timestamps

exceptionTimestamp.description: The System.currentTimeMillis() when throwable was thrown

description: A bug report containing a list of serialized actions and also an exception with the timestamp when it was triggered.
